iconr, training datasets

Source: vignettes/examples.Rmd
examples.Rmd

These training datasets can be downloaded from the below dataframe. We also provide ready-to-use QGIS projects (.qgz) for each decoration:

download name nb.decor description drawings.references
stele bas aragon Estelas Ibericas con Lanzas 5 Iron Age stelae with ranges of spears, writings, etc. Vargas 2013
Valcamonica Ossimo 3 Chalcolithic rock-art from Ossimo, Valcamonica Fedele 1994
Pena Tu Peña Tu style 5 Bell-Beaker stelae and rock-art Ramírez 2005

Developed by Thomas Huet, Jose Pozo.

Site built with pkgdown 1.6.1.
